title: Husband almost killed my daughter's friend and I'm just sick over it

author: endomental
text: Unrelated but OP’s profile is a dumpster fire. No wonder she married an “oaf”

author: redandbluenights
text: On top of that- the guy wasn't just absentminded - he literally admitted to newly taking alprazolam (XANEX)! So he was high /spaced and driving dui. That's how this happened. The ops husband admitted to that in the comments saying he "didn't have his legs under him yet". WTF.

author: endomental
text: OMG, WHAT?!? These parents need their kids safety checked on by cps. The mom is an addict, sounds like the dad is too.

author: redandbluenights
text: Yeah. That was immediately my thought.

author: K19081985
text: Yeah I’m seeing those comments too. Impaired and almost killed a kid and he took the other kids solo to the beach. F me…. Someone’s gonna die. This is so heartbreaking.

author: [deleted]
text: That is totally what it sounded like when I first read this- driving while looking for a cord, but not even checking in kids were in the car. This is why I don't like to let my kids do solo things with their families without me. I have enough friends that live in chaos but present normal to not trust anyone.

author: kindafreakingoutt
text: Prolife and almost killing a kid is pretty ironic

author: breath0fsunshine
text: It truly is. I'm addicted to Kratom but just found out I'm pregnant and I'm also prolife lol what

author: AyepuOnyu
text: Not to mention the David the Gnome slandar. Disgusting.

author: TheWalkingDev
text: Straight out of the tlc channel... sheesh. Nice spot
